MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KA6 and KA7 postcode areas of Ayr and Alloway. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:33pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05am on 3rd January 2021
